'''''Minecraft: The Manga'' Volume 2''' is the second {{W|tankōbon}} volume of the ''[[Minecraft: The Manga]]'' series.

== Chapters ==
*06. Mystery Monster Hunt! (なそのモンスターを討伐せよ!!, ''Na Sono Monsutā o Tōbatsu Seyo!!'')
*07. Battle on the High Seas! (溺死ゾンビと海中バトル!!, ''Dekishi Zonbi to Kaichū Batoru'', lit. "Underwater Battle Against Drowned!!")<!-- Japanese BE Edition calls them "Drowned Zombie" instead of Java Edition's "Drowned" -->
*08. First Festival, Then Treasure! (お宝目指して祭りで勝負!!, ''Otakara Mezashite Matsuri de Shōbu!!'', lit. "Aim for the Treasure and Compete at the Festival!!")
*09. New Creeper Friend?! (クリーパーが仲間になった!?, ''Kurīpā ga Nakama ni natta!?'')
*10. Friends Must Be Protected! (大事な仲間を守り抜け!!, ''Daijina Nakama no Mamorinuke!!'')
